thread.title: Arsenal Exclusive: Barcelona to hijack move for No 1 target to replace Arsene Wenger
thread.title_full: Arsenal Exclusive: Barcelona to hijack move for No 1 target to replace Arsene Wenger

title: Arsenal Exclusive: Barcelona to hijack move for No 1 target to replace Arsene Wenger
text: Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Arsenal Exclusive: Barcelona to hijack move for No 1 target to replace Arsene Wenger ARSENAL could miss out on Masimiliano Allegri their number one target to replace Arsene Wenger after Barcelona entered the race for the Juventus boss. PUBLISHED: PUBLISHED: 22:30, Sat, Feb 25, 2017 GETTY Barcelona are looking to hijack Arsenal's move for Juventus boss Masimiliano Allegri Arsene Wenger â€™s 21-year association with Arsenal could end this summer and Allegri has been in advanced talks with Emirates paymasters about moving to the capital. The 67-year-old is yet to sign a two-year extension to his contract leading to the belief that he could be preparing to make way for some fresh ideas to take over. GETTY Arsene Wenger could be set to end his 21-year association with Arsenal at the end of the season But the Gunners plans could come underdone if Barcelona firm up their interest in Allegri who is close to their sporting director Ariedo Braida. The pair worked together in Milan and Braida has sounded Allegri, 49, out about his plans for next season a sign that he is an option to take over at the Nou Camp. GETTY Barcelona look set to sack Luis Enrique in the summer Arsene Wenger next job odds Fri, February 17, 2017 Click to reveal the best odds for Arsene Wenger's next club if he leaves Arsenal this season
